name: Ffii.GitHub.io
body:
# GSoC Ideas
* Parliament data information and scraping systems as seen at http://parltrack.euwiki.org 
    ml: https://lists.ffii.org/mailman/listinfo/mepdb-parl
* Calendaring solutions with gridcalendar prototype - http://grical.org
* multilingual hypertext - https://lists.ffii.org/mailman/listinfo/mlhtapp-help
* Gnu Groff
* CJK (chinese, Japanese, Korean) internationalisation of text processing, embed Asian text into Latin based documents  http://lists.ffii.org/mailman/listinfo/cjk
* early warning systems
* Crypto project on encrypted key communication -  https://lists.ffii.org/mailman/listinfo/crypto 
* TIO Cloud service infrastructure https://lists.ffii.org/mailman/listinfo/tio
* Encrypted mailing list for the protection of trade secret infrastructure - http://
* Patent information systems just as GAUSS - http://gauss.ffii.org (currently under scheduled maintenance)

# About FFII
* http://ffii.org
* http://blog.ffii.org
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
